channel.title: [UK] Do you live next to a nationalist?
channel.description:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4518081/British_National_Party_(BNP)_membership_list_Nov_2008
The member list was leaked, info such as occupations, names, addresses and telephone numbers.
For anyone who doesn't know the BNP is the British Nationalist Party, basically the most right wing party in the UK. Given the choice they'd kick all the foreigners out, making them essentially legally racist. :|

[/quote]

http://wikileaks.org/leak/bnp-members.xls[/quote]

aah sik guy, cheers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 12:18:31 pm[/size][hr]Mrs Diane Golds 82 Yew Tree Road;Fallowfield;Manchester; M14 7BL 0161 225 0553

Mr Thomas Golds 82 Yew Tree Road;Fallowfield;Manchester; M14 7BL 0161 225 0553 07845 936699 thomas.golds@ntlworld.com Activist

item.title: [UK] Do you live next to a nationalist?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:15, topic:245106”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=321517.msg2543298#msg2543298 date=1227125565]

I have nothing against them, Mopman is our local BNP hater.

Too fuckin’ right. I have no time for “nationalists”.

why?
[/quote]

What reason is there to like a bunch of racist, holocaust denying, violent scumbags?

I’d be willing to just ignore them, were they not getting seats in our government.[/quote]

They’re getting seats because people are fed up with all the immigrants getting free council houses and such, obviously I know nothing about politics to be in a debate so I’ll just stfu, but my mum regularly reads the BNP website.

But hey, at least they aren’t bad as the National Front.

Read full topic
